name: product-automation-testing
description: Comprehensive testing infrastructure for Product Automation System

scripts.test:backend:unit: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python -m pytest tests/unit/ -v
scripts.test:backend:integration: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python -m pytest tests/integration/ -v
scripts.test:backend:connectivity: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python -m pytest tests/connectivity/ -v
scripts.test:lint: npm run test:lint:backend && npm run test:lint:frontend
scripts.test:types: npm run test:types:backend && npm run test:types:frontend
scripts.test:format: npm run test:format:backend && npm run test:format:frontend

author: Product Automation Team
